name: Brandon Andersen
statement:
**Elected Experience**  
None yet  
  
**Other Professional Experience**  
Brandon Andersen is a loving father, husband and local small business owner. Brandon, his wife Veronica, son Atlas, and kitty Juliet live in a historic 1930’s built home in Downtown Kennewick.   
In his spare time, Brandon works on bonsai trees, spends time with family, and eats new foods. Brandon Andersen and his family are often seen taking leisurely walks near Clover Island, Downtown Kennewick, and local parks.  
  
  
**Education**  

Leadership Tri-Cities graduate (Class 24)

WSU Tri-Cities Bachelor's Digital Technology & Culture, Literary Studies Minor

  
  
**Community Service**  

Leadership Tri-Cities, Director of Communications.

MyTri2030, Quality of Life Council 

Arts Center Task Force, Communications Committee

  
  
**Statement**  
Brandon Andersen’s campaign focuses on 3 main objectives. If elected, Brandon Andersen will focus on: Further development for The Creative District, Development of multi-use spaces and performance centers, Improving the quality of life for every Kennewick resident.  
Brandon believes in the City of Kennewick. He values the improvements being made and will continue to support developments that make sense for Kennewick citizens. We need new roads and paths built with bikers and pedestrians in mind.  
  
As the city grows, support for the Kennewick Police and Fire Departments is more important than ever. Because of their service, Kennewick will continue to be a safe place to live.  
Brandon Andersen is grateful for the opportunity and generosity of local supporters that have enabled him to get this far.  
  
Brandon Andersen's focus on the creative district, multi-use spaces, and improvements to our quality of life will make Kennewick a more enjoyable place to live.  
  
Vote Brandon Andersen!
